entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:03 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 10:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
